scripts.start: ngtw build && ng serve -c test --hmr -o --port 3001 && ngtw watch
scripts.build:app-shell: npm run pwa-assets-generator && prettier --write src/index.html && ngtw build --purge && ng run angular-boilerplate:app-shell
scripts.build:app-shell:prod: npm run pwa-assets-generator && prettier --write src/index.html  && ngtw build --purge && ng run angular-boilerplate:app-shell:production
scripts.build-start-open:app-shell: npm run build:app-shell && npm run start-dist
scripts.build-deploy-open:app-shell: npm run build:app-shell:prod && npm run firebase-deploy && start https://test-e0560.web.app/
scripts.build-deploy-open: npm run build:app-shell && npm run firebase-deploy && start https://test-e0560.web.app/
scripts.pwa-assets-generator: pwa-asset-generator src/assets/imgs/logo.svg src/assets/icons -t png -f true -i src/index.html -m src/manifest.webmanifest --path-override assets/icons --opaque false -p 0
scripts.deploy-open-app: npm run pwa-assets-generator && npm run build && npm run firebase-deploy && start https://test-e0560.web.app/
